      • OPT_ROOT

        public static final java.lang.String OPT_ROOT
        Root path for the folder. For exmaple a folder may have a heirachy of /Vidoes/Movies/DVDs/ but you only want to present the view at the DVDs folder, so you set the root to /Vidoes/Movies/DVDs * * "root"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPT_BOOKMARK

        public static final java.lang.String OPT_BOOKMARK
        Bookmark path for the folder. This is similar to root in that it will attempt to find the path of the folder, but the returned value will still have a parent, so that the user can navigate up the heirarchy. When root is used, the returned view does not have a parent. * * "bookmark"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getViewPresentation

        public ViewPresentation getViewPresentation(int level)
        Get the View Presentation for the given View Depth or level. If there isn't a configured view, then an empty default view is returned. This method never returns null.
        Parameters:
        level - view level starting at 1
        Returns:
        a ViewPresentation instance for the given view level
